text: Bharat Pandya is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Gujarat Legislative Assembly from Dhandhuka in the 2002 Gujarat Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He defeated then Chief Minister of Gujarat Dilip Parikh.Bharat Pandya becomes Gujarat BJP General SecretaryMy NetaGujarat: Turn nationalistic wave into votes, says BJP leader ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Gujarat Category:People from Ahmedabad Category:Gujarat MLAs 1998–2002 Category:Gujarat MLAs 2002–2007
title: Bharat Pandya
